message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to us, I'm extending an initial offer of $1500000 for the product.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000 for the product. I believe it's a bit higher than its value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value of the product to both parties, I'd like to propose an adjusted offer of $1200000 for the product. This aligns closely with its value to you and reflects our willingness to reach a fair agreement.

I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $950000 for the product. I believe that's a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand your position, Bob. In light of this, I am prepared to reconsider our previous offers and propose a price of $1100000 for the product. This reflects a compromise that considers both the value of the product to you and the cost to me.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I still think $1100000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to go up to $980000 for the product, but that's as high as I can go. I believe that's a fair price considering its value to me.
Considering our ongoing discussion, I am now proposing a price of $1050000 for the product. This reflects a middle ground that takes into account the value of the product to both of us.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, but I still think $1050000 is a bit high. I'm willing to meet you at $990000 for the product. That's the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your patience and understanding throughout these negotiations, Bob. Based on our discussions, I am now willing to offer the product at $1025000. This price reflects a fair compromise that respects the value of the product to both parties.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $1000000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on this price.
